name: Fantasy Enemy Yokai - Free Pixelart Animated Character
name_original: Fantasy Enemy Yokai - Free Pixelart Animated Character
description:
This a free Fantasy Yokai Enemy Asset. It contains:

  • Idle (8 Frames)
  • Attack (14 Frames)
  • Run (6 Frames)
  • Hurt (5 Frames)
  • Death (10 Frames)

All sprtites are exported as individual and categorized bt each animation.The whole asset is completely free and under development. And any suggestion is accepted.

LICENCE: This asset pack can be used in both free and commercial projects. You can modify it to suit your own needs. Credit is not necessary, but appreciated. You may not redistribute it or resell it.
